name: hotel_reviews
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool priceline_com_provider.
Tool description: priceline.com | Lets you search hotels, cars for rent, flights. **Support**:  [tipsters@rapi.one](mailto:tipsters@rapi.one) / t.me/api_tipsters **Other travel  api:** https://rapi.one
API description: Fetches a list of hotel reviews based on the provided parameters using the Priceline API.

hotel_id.description: The PPN Hotel ID identifying the desired property.

languages.description: Comma-separated language codes to filter the reviews by language. Defaults to 'en,fr'.

order_by.description: Comma-separated sorting order metrics. Valid options include creation_date, average_rating, or verified_guest followed by .asc or .desc.

offset.description: Used with limit to only retrieve a subset of all results at a time. Determines the nuber of properties to skip (starting at 0) before returning results.

limit.description: Limits the number of reviews returned. Defaults to 100.

only_verified_guests.description: Set on to only include only reviews with verified_guests. A verified guest is a guest that has had a review verified by aaa. Valid Options: 0 = Off, 1 = On.
